name: Treasure Hunt (Spartan Game Labs)
description:
Description: You’re a treasure hunter who has come to this forest in the hopes of discovering treasure that has been hidden throughout it. Will you be able to find all of the treasure without dying?

Instructions: Adventure through the forest and try to find all of the treasure while avoiding bandits who have also come in search of the treasure. Use your minimap to guide you through your journey and make sure to look in all areas!

Controls:

WASD - walk

Spacebar - jump

 * The gold star on minimap is where you are starting!
